enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The 22nd session of the IPCC was held from 9-11 November 2004, in New Delhi.
The meeting provided an opportunity for continued deliberations on the IPCCs Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) due to be published in 2007.
Participants discussed, inter alia, the timing, scope, length and content of the AR4 Synthesis Report, approving a process for its development.
Delegates agreed to a 30-page Synthesis Report with a five-page Summary for Policymakers to be approved by the IPCC in late October 2007.
The session also held discussions on IPCC outreach, noting the need to ensure that special reports and the AR4 reach the broadest possible audience.
